P h o ne : + 9 4 770 - 495 - 367 
 
 THARMEALA 
 E - m a i l : tharmilav @ g m a i l . com 
 ANTON XAVIER 
 VIJAYAN 
 L i n k e d I n : l i n k e d i n . com / i n / tharmila-
 vijayan 
 SOFTWARE ENGINEER 
  PROFILE 
 
                                  An enthusiastic, self-motivated and hardworking individual who is 
 passionate in software engineering & cloud services with the urge to 
 face challenging experiences, learn new technologies and work in 
 dynamic, competitive environments while maintaining efficiency and 
 quality of work. Good team player and hard worker to achieve targets 
 and meet deadlines as well as eagerly willing to adapt to any new 
 technology becoming an asset to the company while effectively 
 collaborating to achieve corporate goals. 
 
   EDUC A TION 
 
 
 
 
 DEGREE 
 BSc (HONS) in Information Technology and Management- University of Moratuwa 
 C G P A- 3 . 29 (Up to semester 6) 
 
 GCE A DV A NCED LEVEL   J/ Vadamaradchy central ladies’ college-Jaffna [2015] 
 Commerce Stream: 1A & 2B 
  
 Accounting- A  
   
 ICT- B 
 
 Business Studies- B 
 
 General English- A 
     
 
 Z-Score- 1.8648 
 
 District Rank- 18   
 
   GCE ORDINARY LEVEL         J/ Vadamaradchy central ladies’ college-Jaffna [2012] 
                                     Results- 7A&2B (English Medium- Mathematics, Science & ICT) 
                                     B’s for History & Science. 
 
 EXPERIENCE
 Linearsix pvt Ltd (6 months) 
 SOFTW A RE ENGINEER 
 ( TR A INEE ) 
 Full stack RPA developer (.net, c#)[HNB POC project]                                            
 Tools: AssistEdge, UiPath 
                                      
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 A W A RD & 
 A CHIEVEMENTS 
  
 Completed UiPath RPA Developer Advanced Certificate. 
  
 Completed Fundamentals of IT (UCSC). 
  
 Certificate in interschool Web development competition . 
  
 Certificate in interschool Programming competition (Python). 
  
 Certificates in interschool Speech competitions . 
  
 Certificates in interschool English day competitions . 
 
 
 
  PROJECTS 
 
  Research Project 
 
 Web based plugin for managing Change Requirements on JIRA  (Ongoing) 
 
 
 Final year research project, which focus on providing a better solution to the 
 project management tool JIRA, to effectively handle the Change 
 Requirement Management (CRM) process using Machine-learning techniques. 
 
  Industry based Project 
 Web based Hospital Management System  
 
 
 
 Aim of this project is to deliver a web-based solution, which able to automate all 
 the manual activities takes place in the hospitals. 
 Technologies used: .net MVC, C#, HTML5, Android and MSSQL server 
 
  Hardware Project 
 Automated Egg Candling System 
 
 
 Aim of this project is to develop a mechanism to separate the eggs as fertilized 
 eggs, non-fertilized and damaged eggs. 
 
 Technologies: ATmega32 microcontroller, Temperature sensor and Java for coding 
  
 
 
 TECHNICAL SKILLS 
 
  
 RPA Tools- AssistEdge, UiPath 
  
 Programming Language- Java, Python, C, C#,  PHP 
  
 Web Development- HTML, CSS, Bootstrap, JavaScript 
  
 Data Bases- MSSQL, MYSQL 
  
 Version Control System- GitHub 
 
  
 
 SOFT SKILLS 
  
 Communication Skill (English, Tamil, Sinhala) 
  
 Leadership Skill (High School Prefect, Secretariat of School Banking Unit) 
  
 Interpersonal Skill (Member of Village Youth Club, Member of Tamil 
 Literacy Association-UOM) 
  
 Collaborative working (Team-oriented) 
  
 Organized 
  
 Proactive 
 
 INTERESTS 
 
 
 
 
  Technical Writing 
  Creative Writing 
  Reading 
  Blogging 
 
 NON REL A TED  
 REFEREES 
 
 Lecturer
